list.name: RysEducation
list.description: Hired as freelancer to fix the website's login. However, I was asked to refactor all code. In addition, I developed it using Spring Boot + Spring Security.

list.name: UOL - Universo Online
list.description: Worked as a Backend Developer at UOL, a company in Brazil, I was involved in projects for UOL’s Billing using Java. I used to develop web services to integrate Billing System with internal and external applications. One of my main responsibilities it was to find and fix bugs that they were reported by customers and Notifications from Splunk. I usually created and refactored tests.

list.name: Bull
list.description: Worked as a Java Developer at Bull (www.bull.com), a company in Brazil, I was involved in projects for telecommunications using Java and Sql Server. I used to develop business rules, dashboards, reports, interfaces using ZK framework,I had planned, implemented POCs and fixed bugs.

list.name: Amplio Consultoria e Tecnologia
list.description: The team had the responsibility for developing solutions using RFID technology. The architecture was based on JPA 2.0(EclipseLink e Hibernate), JSF 2, PrimeFaces 3.3, API XStream, Servidor GlassFish e SGBD Postgresql.

list.name: SWDEV
list.description: Our client publish in its magazine datas as balance sheets and analysis for its clients. We worked with a financial Chilean company to develop a WebService, which was used C#.NET and SQL Server. In addition, It was created a Excel application(VBA) to test all services.

list.name: RysEducation
list.description: Contratado para corrigir autenticação do site. No entanto, mais tarde fui contratado para atualizar o projeto usando como principais frameworks o Spring Boot e Spring Security.

list.name: UOL - Universo Online
list.description: Contratado como Desenvolvedor Java no departamento de Billing da UOL. Principais atividades era criação de serviços web para disponibilizar e conectar com os outros departamentos .Outras responsabilidades era encontrar e corrigir bugs que eram reportados por clientes. Criar novos testes e refatorar testes antigos.

list.name: Bull
list.description: Contratado como Desenvolvedor Java envolvido em projetos de telecomunicações utilizando JavaEE e Sql Server. Principais atividades eram desenvolver regras de negócios, painéis, relatórios, interfaces usando o framework ZK, planejava, implementava POCs e corrigia bugs.

list.name: Amplio Consultoria e Tecnologia
list.description: A equipe teve a responsabilidade de desenvolver soluções utilizando a tecnologia RFID. A arquitetura foi baseada em JPA 2.0(EclipseLink e Hibernate), JSF 2, PrimeFaces 3.3, API XStream, Servidor GlassFish e SGBD Postgresql.

list.name: SWDEV
list.description: Nosso cliente  em sua revista publicava dados como balanços e análises para seus clientes. Trabalhamos com uma empresa financeira chilena para desenvolver um WebService, que foi utilizado C#.NET e SQL Server. Além disso, foi criado um aplicativo Excel (VBA) para testar todos os serviços.
